colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES BLA MA MCHOG GSUM GYI THUGS RJES BSKUL BA NGES 'BYUNG SKYO SHAS KYI SHUGS GLU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNYIGS MA LNGA PO CHE CHER BDO BA'I DUS KYI RANG GZHAN DU MA'I SPYOD TSUL SNA TSOGS MTHONG BAS RKYEN BYAS TE, KYI HUD KYI HUD, 'DREN PA NYAMS MED ZAS GTZANG GI SRAS POS RANG BCAG KHO NA'I CHED DU BSKAL PA GRANGS MED BAR DU MANG DKA' BRGYA GIS GO 'PHANG MCHOG BSGRUB NAS THUGS BRTZE BA CHEN POS GDAMS PA'I CHOS KYI TSUL NGO MTSAR RMAD DU 'BYUNG BA 'DI NI NGANG TSUL DE LTA BUR GYUR ZHING, 'GRO BA 'DI DGE BDE SKYID KYANG 'DI 'DRAR GYUR TO SNYAM DU NGES 'BYUNG SPU SUD SKYE BA'I TSE, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS BSTEN PA LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES GZHAN LA PHAN RE MED KYANG, RANG GI YID GSOS SU, ,BLA MA MCHOG GSUM LA GSOL 'DEBS SNYAN DNGAGS DANG MNGON RJOD SOGS KYIS MA BCINGS PAR 'BOL RTZOM LUGS SU GANG THOB, MKHAS PA MKHAS PAR RLOM PA DAG THUGS MI KHRI BA ZHU, ,YI GE PA NI RANG GI GAM DU NYE BAR GNAS PA'I DPYOD LDAN TSUL KHRIMS BGYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
